name: Future Robot Fight 3D
description:
Super Robot Fighting 3D puts the power, intensity raw and smack down of emotion of wrestling in the palm of your hand. Fight using a variety of revolution grappling type techniques such as metal kicks and steel punches to maintain a superior position over your opponent!
Features:
* Robot fight in the ring with death machines
* Unleash your metal punches and steel kicks
* Knock out the real robot by fighting in the ring
* Excellent indoor robot wrestling environment
